meanings.definition: Having great extent from side to side
meanings.sent1: The river was the widest part of the valley.
meanings.sent2: The road is the widest in the entire town.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to squeeze through the widest gap in the fence.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the widest, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The widest tree in the forest provided ample shade.

meanings.sent1: She widened her eyes to the widest possible extent.
meanings.sent2: The river widens at its widest point.
meanings.sent3: He widened his arms to the widest angle, pretending to be an airplane.
meanings.sent4: The road widens as it reaches its widest section.
meanings.sent5: The smile widened to its widest, showing all her teeth.

meanings.definition: Most extensive or broadest in range or scope
meanings.sent1: The library had the widest selection of books in town.
meanings.sent2: Her knowledge on the subject was the widest among the group.
meanings.sent3: The widest view of the city could be seen from the top of the hill.
meanings.sent4: His influence was the widest, reaching people from all walks of life.
meanings.sent5: The widest road led to the grandest castle in the kingdom.
